name: Driving Bump: High Speed Car
description:
Drive block cars over speed bumps and pass through reckless obstacles. Start your car engine and dash carefully through the challenging hurdles to avoid any car beam crash. With many different cars with different category and types to drive on challenging tracks. Complete each challenging with different cars. Be ready for challenge and try not to be crash before you complete each challenge, improve your experience as you get skills and challenge new levels. Complete all challenges and be master of car game. Here you can prove your self best driver with realistic bump simulation that crash your car if you are not taking care of driving speed, tight your seat belt to make sure your are going for most adventitious ride. Get ready to defeat deadly speed breakers in challenging car game.
Features:
- sports cars and destructible vehicles
- Both challenging and endless car destruction modes
- Free-to-play
- Realistic car racing feeling
- Super fast speed
- Smooth controls and addictive game-play.
